body:
### Steps to reproduce

When running `spack -C my_config_scope spec zlib` Spack disregards `my_config_scope` during bootstrapping.

I haven't checked what the behavior of `spack -c x:y:z spec zlib` is during bootstrapping.

I have to be able to specify the staging dir on the command line in some way, also the one used during bootstrapping.
title: Bootstrap disregards command line scopes
